summary: A victim's anonymous statement submitted to a court, likely in opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's request for bond or bail. The statement details the victim's account of Maxwell's role as a manipulative predator who recruited and delivered victims to Jeffrey Epstein, expresses fear of Maxwell fleeing or silencing witnesses, and implores the court to deny her release.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described by the victim as a calculating, sadistic manipulator who recruited victims for Jeffrey Epstein, was in charge of the abuse, and poses a flight risk.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual to whom the victim was delivered by Ghislaine Maxwell for heinous and dehumanizing abuse.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as enabling Epstein's abuse by recruiting and delivering victims to him, egging him on, and acting to satisfy him.
Maxwell nurtured a relationship with the victim, abused their trust, took advantage of their vulnerability, and delivered them to Epstein for abuse.

events.title: Victim's Recruitment and Abuse
events.description: The victim describes being manipulated and anaesthetized by Ghislaine Maxwell, who then delivered them to Jeffrey Epstein with full knowledge of the awaiting abuse.

events.title: Threatening Phone Call
events.description: When the victim was listed as a witness in a civil action involving Maxwell, they received a threatening phone call in the middle of the night, threatening their life if they testified.

events.title: Court Proceeding Regarding Bond
events.description: The document is a submission to a court, imploring it not to grant bond to Ghislaine Maxwell, citing her flight risk and danger to victims.

keyFacts: The victim states unequivocally that 'Without Ghislaine, Jeffrey could not have done what he did. She was in charge.'
The victim received a life-threatening phone call when listed as a witness in a civil action against Maxwell, indicating witness intimidation.
The victim expresses extreme fear that Maxwell will flee due to her international connections and has no remorse for her actions.
The document is a direct plea to a court to deny Ghislaine Maxwell bond or bail, citing her danger to victims and the judicial process.
